meanings.sent1: The brave mountaineer reached the summit of the peak.
meanings.sent2: The experienced mountaineer led the group on a challenging expedition.
meanings.sent3: The mountaineer joked that climbing mountains was his idea of a fun workout.
meanings.sent4: She tackled her problems like a skilled mountaineer scaling a steep cliff.
meanings.sent5: The mountaineer's passion for climbing was as high as the mountains themselves.

meanings.definition: To climb mountains as a sport or profession.
meanings.sent1: They decided to mountaineer in the Himalayas during their vacation.
meanings.sent2: She loves to mountaineer in her free time, seeking new challenges.
meanings.sent3: He planned to mountaineer up the hill for his morning exercise.
meanings.sent4: The team will mountaineer up the rocky terrain to test their skills.
meanings.sent5: Mountaineering requires strength, determination, and a love for adventure.
